p: Sexual mode of ZIKV spread has been suggested by Foy et al. in 2011. The patient contracted the infection in Senegal and got his wife infected via unprotected sex on his visit to the US.[ 38] Sexual mode of ZIKV spread has been reinforced by the fact that the viral RNA can be detected in the semen even after 17 days of acute illness and 62 days after the symptoms sets in.[ 11 39] ZIKV demonstration from the semen emphasize the avoidance of unprotected sexual practices and necessitates condom usage (primarily throughout pregnancy), thus preventing ZIKV spread by sexual mode.[ 40]
